Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: Tan84
Reviews.Content: returned 2 night stay gresham 4 female friends reading below reviews worried stay wasnt bad £60 2 nights bookingcom paid allowed drop suitcases morning told checkin 3pm 10 minute walk oxford street werent bothered checkin told annex means drop key everytime return impression werent pretty bathroom newly refurbished pleased desperate lick paint difference landing stinking smoke fire looked dirty dusted beds ok girly weekend slept ready fine deal stay location massive plus plenty

Reviews.Content: months ago friend decided trip london exited booked hotel bookingcom looked friendly hotel location rating decent 7 sow worries arrived immediately uncomfortable ring bell unfriendly angry looking woman door looked booking information told 300 pm time unfriendly door en told wait filthy waiting bag garbage placed strange looking girl sleeping torn chairs looked ages told lobby pay immediately mistake stairs 3th floor receiving key floor filthy laundry night layed ground staff yelling unknown reasons thats wasnt entered bathroom toilet dirty wash basin 2 beds people writing walls wasnt cleaned mirror filthy decided spend 2 nights search hotel didnt succeeded left london hotel day arrived thank people gresham wonderfull london experience realy dont running worst hotel
